Key Match Events: The Rangers took three of the four games against the Los Angeles Angels
Marcus Semien hit a leadoff home run in Sunday's win
Nathaniel Lowe hit a two-run home run against the Los Angeles Angels in the first inning
Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Heaney hoped his teammates would play 'loose and free' for the final month
Josh Smith believes the return of Josh Jung from injury has made a difference
Post-Match Reflections: Bruce Bochy said that when the team isn't getting base hits, they look kind of flat, but they're not
Josh Smith said Josh Jung has been swinging a really good bat lately
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers have won 10 of their past 13 games
The team is 7.5 games back in the AL West and 6.5 games back of the final Wild Card berth with 18 games remaining
Others: The Rangers' offense has finally seemed to be infectious
The team's vibes are good in the clubhouse for the first time in months
